entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
